title: [K-12] STEAM-Integrated Advanced Math Learning Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematics and science concepts, along with foundational awareness of STEAM education
context.additional_context: Focused on strengthening practical math application skills for job seekers, operating in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: In a STEAM project context, learners can systematically apply mathematical problem-solving strategies.
Through integrated educational activities, learners can connect advanced mathematical concepts (e.g., geometry, data analysis) to real-world problems.
During collaborative project execution, learners enhance mathematical communication and critical thinking skills.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
